client.apis.v1.tests.test_finance_sign_and_loan 源代码

# -*- coding: UTF-8 -*-
"""
@Summary : 测试融资签约/放款
@Author  : Rey
@Time    : 2022-04-13 14:41:30
@Run     : python manage.py test client.apis.v1.tests.test_finance_sign_and_loan -v=3 --keepdb
"""
from datetime import datetime

from rest_framework import status
from rest_framework.test import APITestCase

from client.apis.v1.tests.base import action_cache
from client.apis.v1.tests import mock_common_cc_approval as mock
from client.models.contract import Contract
from client.models.credit_certificate import (
    CreditCertificate, FinanceProject, TransferLog
)
from client.models.evidence import ChainEvidence
from utils.jwt_util import user_info_2_token



[文档]class TestFinanceSignLoan(APITestCase):
    """test FinancingProjectUploadAPIView.update"""
    databases = {'default', 'credible_data'}
    fixtures = (
        'app_menus.json', 'const_company.json', 'const_credit.json', 'location.json', 'business.json', 'work_flow.json',
        'business_map.json', 'const_platform.json', 'evidence_type.json', 'base_common_cc_approval.json'
    )


[文档]    @action_cache
    def client_request(self, uid: int, company_uid: str, fk_id: int, is_sign: bool):
        """封装请求

        :param int uid: 用户id
        :param str company_uid: 公司uid
        :param int fk_id: 融资项目id
        :param bool is_sign: 是否是签约
        :return _type_: _description_
        """
        mock.create_all_users()
        path = f'/api/v1_1_0/scf/client/financing/upload/{fk_id}/'
        token = user_info_2_token({'user_id': uid})
        self.client.credentials(HTTP_AUTHORIZATION=f'Bear {bytes.decode(token)}')
        data = {
            "file_type": "sign_contract" if is_sign else "loan_voucher",
            "upload_data": [
                {
                    "md5_code": "3",
                    "url": "http://tigyykbvk.by/bvfrpfgfnv",
                    "file_name": "龙立活数么消",
                    "size": "ipsum"
                },
                {
                    "md5_code": "4",
                    "url": "http://bkbkib.cu/cxj",
                    "file_name": "则花间儿查带",
                    "size": "ut tempor sed cillum"
                },
                {
                    "md5_code": "95",
                    "url": "http://zwfwluh.tel/jabgco",
                    "file_name": "于下后着",
                    "size": "culpa adipisicing"
                }
            ]
        }
        return self.client.put(
            path, data=data, format='json', HTTP_ELAB_COMPANY=company_uid
        )



[文档]    def assertAPIException(self, resp, msg: str):
        """断言AIPIException

        :param _type resp: response
        :param str msg: 错误信息
        """
        self.assertEqual(resp.status_code, status.HTTP_200_OK)
        resp_json = resp.json()
        self.assertEqual(resp_json['code'], status.HTTP_500_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR)
        self.assertIsNone(resp_json['data'])
        self.assertEqual(resp_json['msg'], msg)



[文档]    def test_success_sign(self):
        """测试成功签约"""
        credit = mock.create_credit(mock.CompanyEnum.NORMAL_ONE.value, mock.CompanyEnum.FINANCING.value)
        _, finance_items = mock.create_finance_cc(credit.pk, mock.WorkFlowEnum.FINANCE_SETUP)
        cc = finance_items['cc']
        finance_project = finance_items['finance_project']
        resp = self.client_request(3, 'H6aSWCy3dq7TANcwWDpLqL', finance_project.pk, True)
        resp_json = resp.json()

        self.assertEqual(resp.status_code, status.HTTP_200_OK)
        self.assertEqual(resp_json['code'], status.HTTP_200_OK)
        self.assertEqual(resp_json['msg'], 'ok')

        new_cc = CreditCertificate.objects.get(pk=cc.pk)
        self.assertEqual(new_cc.review_status, 'pass')
        self.assertEqual(new_cc.confirm_at, datetime.now().date())

        self.assertTrue(
            Contract.objects.filter(
                credit_certificate_id=cc.pk, contract_type='finance'
            ).exists()
        )

        new_fk = FinanceProject.objects.get(pk=finance_project.pk)
        self.assertEqual(new_fk.status, 'un_pay')
        self.assertIsNotNone(new_fk.sign_contract_at)
        self.assertIsNotNone(new_fk.sign_contract_enclosure)

        self.assertTrue(TransferLog.objects.filter(credit_certificate_id=cc.pk).exists())

        self.assertTrue(
            ChainEvidence.objects.filter(
                data_type='data', credit_certificate_id=cc.pk,
                evidence_type_id=mock.EvidenceTypeEnum.FINANCE.value
            ).exists()
        )
        self.assertTrue(
            ChainEvidence.objects.filter(
                data_type='file', credit_certificate_id=cc.pk,
                evidence_type_id=mock.EvidenceTypeEnum.FINANCE_SIGN.value
            ).exists()
        )



[文档]    def test_success_loan(self):
        """测试成功放款"""
        credit = mock.create_credit(mock.CompanyEnum.NORMAL_ONE.value, mock.CompanyEnum.FINANCING.value)
        _, finance_items = mock.create_finance_cc(credit.pk, mock.WorkFlowEnum.FINANCE_SETUP, finance_project_status='un_pay')
        cc = finance_items['cc']
        finance_project = finance_items['finance_project']
        resp = self.client_request(3, 'H6aSWCy3dq7TANcwWDpLqL', finance_project.pk, False)
        resp_json = resp.json()
        print(resp_json)
        self.assertEqual(resp.status_code, status.HTTP_200_OK)
        self.assertEqual(resp_json['code'], status.HTTP_200_OK)
        self.assertEqual(resp_json['msg'], 'ok')

        new_fk = FinanceProject.objects.get(pk=finance_project.pk)
        self.assertEqual(new_fk.status, 'un_clear')
        self.assertIsNotNone(new_fk.loan_at)
        self.assertIsNotNone(new_fk.loan_voucher_enclosure)

        self.assertTrue(
            ChainEvidence.objects.filter(
                data_type='file', credit_certificate_id=cc.pk,
                evidence_type_id=mock.EvidenceTypeEnum.FINANCE_AGREEMENT.value
            ).exists()
        )



[文档]    def test_fail_sign_1(self):
        """测试失败: 签约融资项目状态!=un_sign"""
        credit = mock.create_credit(mock.CompanyEnum.NORMAL_ONE.value, mock.CompanyEnum.FINANCING.value)
        _, finance_items = mock.create_finance_cc(credit.pk, mock.WorkFlowEnum.FINANCE_SETUP, finance_project_status='un_pay')
        finance_project = finance_items['finance_project']
        resp = self.client_request(3, 'H6aSWCy3dq7TANcwWDpLqL', finance_project.pk, True)
        self.assertAPIException(resp, 'invalid data type')



[文档]    def test_fail_loan_1(self):
        """测试失败: 放款融资项目状态!=un_pay"""
        credit = mock.create_credit(mock.CompanyEnum.NORMAL_ONE.value, mock.CompanyEnum.FINANCING.value)
        _, finance_items = mock.create_finance_cc(credit.pk, mock.WorkFlowEnum.FINANCE_SETUP)
        finance_project = finance_items['finance_project']
        resp = self.client_request(3, 'H6aSWCy3dq7TANcwWDpLqL', finance_project.pk, False)
        self.assertAPIException(resp, 'invalid data type')



[文档]    def test_fail_1(self):
        """测试失败: 核心企业请求"""
        credit = mock.create_credit(mock.CompanyEnum.NORMAL_ONE.value, mock.CompanyEnum.FINANCING.value)
        _, finance_items = mock.create_finance_cc(credit.pk, mock.WorkFlowEnum.FINANCE_SETUP)
        finance_project = finance_items['finance_project']
        resp = self.client_request(1, '4aMaYaeNRWQaYTy8Ydm2Hn', finance_project.pk, False)
        self.assertAPIException(resp, 'invalid company')



[文档]    def test_fail_2(self):

        credit = mock.create_credit(mock.CompanyEnum.NORMAL_ONE.value, mock.CompanyEnum.FINANCING.value)

        finance_project = finance_items['finance_project']

[文档]    def test_fail_3(self):
        """测试失败: 当前工作流!=finance_setup"""
        credit = mock.create_credit(mock.CompanyEnum.NORMAL_ONE.value, mock.CompanyEnum.FINANCING.value)
        _, finance_items = mock.create_finance_cc(credit.pk, mock.WorkFlowEnum.FINANCE_APPLY)
        finance_project = finance_items['finance_project']
        resp = self.client_request(3, 'H6aSWCy3dq7TANcwWDpLqL', finance_project.pk, False)
        self.assertAPIException(resp, 'invalid work flow')
